reviews.text: Great place. Whether you'd like a delicious coffee or a four course dinner, you'll be well served there. The Atmosphere at Frenchie's is subtle, refined and artsy because the owner is an art collector. There is a broad collection of art literature, interesting catalogues and magazines spread across the space, which is another plus.

A little bit of France in Kiev. Always here when I'm in Kiev :-) 
Breakfast very good and tasty, recommended
Wonderful little place, staff were very polite and has a really cool French jazz club vibe, loved it!
Nice place. Fish solyanka was delicious.
